CreateDedicatedCluster.document: This API is used to create a CDC.
CreateDedicatedCluster.name: Creates a CDC.

CreateDedicatedClusterOrder.document: This API is used to create a CDC order.
CreateDedicatedClusterOrder.name: Creates a CDC order.

CreateSite.document: This API is used to create a site.
CreateSite.name: Creates a site.

DeleteDedicatedClusters.document: This API is used to delete a CDC.
DeleteDedicatedClusters.name: Deletes a CDC.

DeleteSites.document: This API is used to delete a site.
DeleteSites.name: Deletes a site.

DescribeDedicatedClusterCosCapacity.document: This API is used to query the Cloud Object Storage (COS) capacity of the CDC.
DescribeDedicatedClusterCosCapacity.name: Queries the Cloud Object Storage (COS) capacity of the CDC.

DescribeDedicatedClusterHostStatistics.document: This API is used to query the statistic information of the host in the CDC.
DescribeDedicatedClusterHostStatistics.name: Queries the statistic information of the host in the CDC.

DescribeDedicatedClusterHosts.document: This API is used to query host information of the CDC
DescribeDedicatedClusterHosts.name: Queries host information of the CDC

DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceTypes.document: This API is used to query instance types supported by the CDC.
DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceTypes.name: Queries instance types supported by the CDC.

DescribeDedicatedClusterOrders.document: This API is used to query the list of CDC orders.
DescribeDedicatedClusterOrders.name: Queries the list of CDC orders.

DescribeDedicatedClusterOverview.document: This API is used to query the overview of the CDC
DescribeDedicatedClusterOverview.name: Queries overview of the CDC

DescribeDedicatedClusterTypes.document: This API is used to query the configuration list of the CDC.
DescribeDedicatedClusterTypes.name: Queries the configuration list of the CDC.

DescribeDedicatedClusters.document: This API is used to query the CDC list.
DescribeDedicatedClusters.name: Queries the CDC list.

DescribeDedicatedSupportedZones.document: This API is used to query the list of AZs supported by the CDC.
DescribeDedicatedSupportedZones.name: Queries the list of AZs supported by the CDC.

DescribeSites.document: This API is used to query the site list.
DescribeSites.name: Queries the site list.

DescribeSitesDetail.document: This API is used to query site details.
DescribeSitesDetail.name: Queries site details.

ModifyDedicatedClusterInfo.document: This API is used to modify the CDC information.
ModifyDedicatedClusterInfo.name: Modifies the CDC information.

ModifyOrderStatus.document: This API is used to modify the status of large and small orders.
ModifyOrderStatus.name: Modifies order status.

ModifySiteDeviceInfo.document: This API is used to modify the information about devices in the equipment room.
ModifySiteDeviceInfo.name: Modifies the information about devices in the equipment room.

ModifySiteInfo.document: This API is used to modify the equipment room information.
ModifySiteInfo.name: Modifies the equipment room information.

members.name: PowerDrawKva

members.name: UplinkSpeedGbps

members.document: Number of uplinks used by each CDC device (2 devices per rack) when connected to the network
members.name: UplinkCount

members.document:
Whether the following environmental conditions are met: 
1. There are no material requirements or the acceptance standard on site that will affect the delivery and installation of the CDC device. 
2. The following conditions are met for finalized rack positions: 
Temperature ranges from 41 to 104°F (5 to 40°C). 
Humidity ranges from 10°F (-12°C) to 70°F (21°C) and relative humidity ranges from 8% RH to 80% RH. 
Air flows from front to back at the rack position and there is sufficient air in CFM (cubic feet per minute). The air quantity in CFM must be 145.8 times the power consumption (in KVA) of CDC.
members.name: ConditionRequirement

members.document:
Whether the following dimension conditions are met: 
Your loading dock can accommodate one rack container (H x W x D = 94" x 54" x 48"). 
You can provide a clear route from the delivery point of your rack (H x W x D = 80" x 24" x 48") to its final installation location. You should consider platforms, corridors, doors, turns, ramps, freight elevators as well as other access restrictions when measuring the depth. 
There shall be a 48" or greater front clearance and a 24" or greater rear clearance where the CDC is finally installed.
members.name: DimensionRequirement

members.document: Whether redundant upstream equipment (switch or router) is provided so that both network devices can be connected to the network.

members.document: Whether there is an upstream circuit breaker?
members.name: BreakerRequirement

members.name: PowerDrawKva

members.document: Uplink speed from the network to Tencent Cloud Region

members.document: Number of uplinks used by each CDC device (2 devices per rack) when connected to the network
members.name: UplinkCount

members.document:
Whether the following environmental conditions are met: 
1. There are no material requirements or the acceptance standard on site that will affect the delivery and installation of the CDC device. 
2. The following conditions are met for finalized rack positions: 
Temperature ranges from 41 to 104°F (5 to 40°C). 
Humidity ranges from 10°F (-12°C) to 70°F (21°C) and relative humidity ranges from 8% RH to 80% RH. 
Air flows from front to back at the rack position and there is sufficient air in CFM (cubic feet per minute). The air quantity in CFM must be 145.8 times the power consumption (in KVA) of CDC.
members.name: ConditionRequirement

members.document:
Whether the following dimension conditions are met: 
Your loading dock can accommodate one rack container (H x W x D = 94" x 54" x 48"). 
You can provide a clear route from the delivery point of your rack (H x W x D = 80" x 24" x 48") to its final installation location. You should consider platforms, corridors, doors, turns, ramps, freight elevators as well as other access restrictions when measuring the depth. 
There shall be a 48" or greater front clearance and a 24" or greater rear clearance where the CDC is finally installed.
members.name: DimensionRequirement

members.document: Whether redundant upstream equipment (switch or router) is provided so that both network devices can be connected to the network.
members.name: RedundantNetworking

members.document: Whether you need help from Tencent Cloud for rack installation?
members.name: NeedHelp

members.document: Whether there is power redundancy?
members.name: RedundantPower

members.document: Whether there is an upstream circuit breaker?
members.name: BreakerRequirement
